verses.verse: Then came <WH935> certain <WH582> of the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> to me, and sat <WH3427> before <WH6440> me.
And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> these <WH428> men <WH582> have set <WH5927> up their idols <WH1544> in their heart, <WH3820> and put <WH5414> the stumbling block <WH4383> of their iniquity <WH5771> before <WH5227> their face: <WH6440> should I be inquired <WH1875> of at all by them?

Therefore <WH3651> speak <WH1696> to them, and say <WH559> to them, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Every man <WH376> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> that sets <WH5927> up his idols <WH1544> in his heart, <WH3820> and puts <WH7760> the stumbling block <WH4383> of his iniquity <WH5771> before <WH5227> his face, <WH6440> and comes <WH935> to the prophet; <WH5030> I the LORD <WH3068> will answer <WH6030> him that comes <WH935> according to the multitude <WH7230> of his idols; <WH1544>
That I may take <WH8610> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> in their own heart, <WH3820> because <WH834> they are all <WH3605> estranged <WH2114> from me through their idols. <WH1544>

Therefore <WH3651> say <WH559> to the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Repent, <WH7725> and turn <WH7725> yourselves from your idols; <WH1544> and turn <WH7725> away your faces <WH6440> from all <WH3605> your abominations. <WH8441>

For every <WH376> one <WH376> of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> or of the stranger <WH1616> that sojournes <WH1481> in Israel, <WH3478> which separates <WH5144> himself from me, and sets <WH5927> up his idols <WH1544> in his heart, <WH3820> and puts <WH7760> the stumbling block <WH4383> of his iniquity <WH5771> before <WH5227> his face, <WH6440> and comes <WH935> to a prophet <WH5030> to inquire <WH1875> of him concerning me; I the LORD <WH3068> will answer <WH6030> him by myself:

And I will set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> against that man, <WH376> and will make <WH8074> him a sign <WH226> and a proverb, <WH4912> and I will cut <WH3772> him off from the middle <WH8432> of my people; <WH5971> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

And if <WH3588> the prophet <WH5030> be deceived <WH6601> when <WH3588> he has spoken <WH1696> a thing, <WH1697> I the LORD <WH3068> have deceived <WH6601> that prophet, <WH5030> and I will stretch <WH5186> out my hand <WH3027> on him, and will destroy <WH8045> him from the middle <WH8432> of my people <WH5971> Israel. <WH3478>

And they shall bear <WH5375> the punishment <WH5771> of their iniquity: <WH5771> the punishment <WH5771> of the prophet <WH5030> shall be even as the punishment <WH5771> of him that seeks <WH1875> to him;

That the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> may go <WH8582> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> astray <WH8582> from me, neither <WH3808> be polluted <WH2930> any <WH3605> more <WH5750> with all <WH3605> their transgressions; <WH6588> but that they may be my people, <WH5971> and I may be their God, <WH430> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> again to me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> when <WH3588> the land <WH776> sins <WH2398> against me by trespassing <WH4603> grievously, <WH4604> then will I stretch <WH5186> out my hand <WH3027> on it, and will break <WH7665> the staff <WH4294> of the bread <WH3899> thereof, and will send <WH7971> famine <WH7458> on it, and will cut <WH3772> off man <WH120> and beast <WH929> from it:

Though these <WH428> three <WH7969> men, <WH582> Noah, <WH5146> Daniel, <WH1840> and Job, <WH347> were in it, they should deliver <WH5337> but their own souls <WH5315> by their righteousness, <WH6666> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

If <WH3863> I cause noisome <WH7451> beasts <WH2416> to pass <WH5674> through the land, <WH776> and they spoil <WH7921> it, so <WH3651> that it be desolate, <WH8077> that no <WH1097> man may pass <WH5674> through because <WH6440> of the beasts: <WH2416>

Though these <WH428> three <WH7969> men <WH582> were in it, as I live, <WH2416> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> they shall deliver <WH5337> neither <WH518> sons <WH1121> nor <WH518> daughters; <WH1323> they only <WH905> shall be delivered, <WH5337> but the land <WH776> shall be desolate. <WH8077>

Or <WH176> if I bring <WH935> a sword <WH2719> on that land, <WH776> and say, <WH559> Sword, <WH2719> go <WH5674> through the land; <WH776> so <WH3651> that I cut <WH3772> off man <WH120> and beast <WH929> from it:

Though these <WH428> three <WH7969> men <WH582> were in it, as I live, <WH2416> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> they shall deliver <WH5337> neither <WH3808> sons <WH1121> nor daughters, <WH1323> but they only <WH905> shall be delivered <WH5337> themselves.

Or <WH176> if I send <WH7971> a pestilence <WH1698> into <WH413> that land, <WH776> and pour <WH8210> out my fury <WH2534> on it in blood, <WH1818> to cut <WH3772> off from it man <WH120> and beast: <WH929>

Though Noah, <WH5146> Daniel, <WH1840> and Job <WH347>were in it, as I live, <WH2416> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> they shall deliver <WH5337> neither <WH518> son <WH1121> nor <WH518> daughter; <WH1323> they shall but deliver <WH5337> their own souls <WH5315> by their righteousness. <WH6666>

For thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> How <WH637> much <WH637> more <WH5750> when <WH3588> I send <WH7971> my four <WH702> sore <WH7451> judgments <WH8201> on Jerusalem, <WH3389> the sword, <WH2719> and the famine, <WH7458> and the noisome <WH7451> beast, <WH2416> and the pestilence, <WH1698> to cut <WH3772> off from it man <WH120> and beast? <WH929>

Yet, behold, <WH2009> therein shall be left <WH3498> a remnant <WH6413> that shall be brought <WH3318> forth, <WH4163> both sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323> behold, <WH2009> they shall come <WH3318> forth <WH3318> to you, and you shall see <WH7200> their way <WH1870> and their doings: <WH5949> and you shall be comforted <WH5162> concerning <WH5921> the evil <WH7451> that I have brought <WH935> on Jerusalem, <WH3389> even concerning <WH854> all <WH3605> that I have brought <WH935> on it.

And they shall comfort <WH5162> you, when you see <WH7200> their ways <WH1870> and their doings: <WH5949> and you shall know <WH3045> that I have not done <WH6213> without <WH2600> cause <WH2600> all <WH3605> that I have done <WH6213> in it, said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
